Usage example

Assuming in controller there is $scope.launcherIcon = 'arrow-left':


            <span nav-icon icon="launcherIcon" class="cursor-pointer"></span>
Result:

Icon can be defined in template directly as a string:


            <span nav-icon icon="'list'" class="cursor-pointer"></span>
Result:

Using `nav-icon` directive:


            <span nav-icon="'chevron-left'" class="cursor-pointer"></span>
Result:

Arbitrary glyphicons:


            <div nav-icon="'refresh'"></div>
Result:
